cause.description:
my friend krystal and amanda are moving on the 31st of july and can not take their kitty with them he is house broken and well trained and needs a good family he is under a year old and is orange and white is very cuddly and loving
1. he deserves a good home
2. he is an indoor cat
3. he needs a family soon
cause.mission: give a good home to this kitty
cause.name: FIND A GOOD HOME FOR THEODORE
